participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and outgoing, she enjoys socializing and exploring new activities. Emily is adventurous when it comes to trying new things.
participant_1.background: I'm married to a government worker and love milk with my large meals. I have never been arrested, but I have been warned by the police for riding my horse too fast. I don't care how I look, I'm just going to enjoy the concert with my friend. I read everything I could about my family history. My parents are lawyers.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and reflective, he has a passion for writing and enjoys outdoor activities. Jake is ambitious and dreams of making his culinary aspirations come true.
participant_2.background: I ride my bicycle every day to keep fit and to clear my head so I can focus on my writing. I spent more time climbing since I quit my job. My dream is to open a restaurant and share my love of food with others. I listen to Katy Perry while in the shower. I have 10 alpacas.

content.text: Hi! I hope you are having a great day!
Thanks, you too! I'm doing well, just finished a long bike ride.
Awesome! I love biking! I do it all the time to keep fit. What kind of bike do you have?
I have a mountain bike. It's really fun to ride on trails.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never tried mountain biking before.
You should give it a try! It's really great exercise.
Maybe I will! I'm always looking for new ways to stay active.
That's great! Let me know if you ever want to go for a ride together.
I will! Thanks for the offer!
What else do you like to do for fun?
I love to write. I'm working on a novel right now.
That's awesome! I love to write too. I'm working on a short story collection.
That's great! I'd love to read it when you're finished.
Thanks! I'll let you know when it's done.
